description: IRED-style contrastive loss: softplus(E_pos - E_neg) replaces CD (E_neg - E_pos). Uses same Langevin negatives + replay buffer as q203 but with stable logistic contrastive objective.
notes: Key experiment: IRED-style contrastive loss replaces CD objective. softplus(E_pos - E_neg) directly enforces E_pos < E_neg via stable logistic form. data_sample reuses denoising y_t (no separate noise draw) for lower variance. Same Langevin + replay infrastructure as q203. Tests whether the contrastive objective fixes the landscape shaping that CD failed at.
